Package tage

Class Viewport

java.lang.Object
tage.Viewport
public class Viewport extends Object
One viewport covering a portion of the GLCanvas, and an associated camera. A viewport is defined by specifying its left, bottom, width, and height values. Each viewport is identified by a String name. By default, the engine creates a single viewport named "MAIN".

The game application should NOT instantiate viewports directly. Instead, it should use the addViewport() function in RenderSystem.

Author:
Scott Gordon
